product_name: Metolius Backboard Training Board Wall Mount
long_description: Use the Metolius Backboard Training Board wall mount to install your Metolius training board (sold separately). It also work with many other brands of training boards. Finished piece of plywood measures 32 x 9.5 x 0.75 in. Mount the Metolius Backboard to a wall in your home then mount your training board (sold separately) to the Backboard. Comes complete with mounting hardware and instructions.
short_description: Use the Metolius Backboard Training Board wall mount to install your Metolius training board (sold separately). It also work with many other brands of training boards.
